summary: Website/app deployment project; currently addressing OG/Twitter Card caching issues on X (Twitter) by updating Open Graph/Twitter meta tags and using a versioned OG image served from /public/assets with consistent canonical/og:url.
architectural_notes: Serve OG image as a static asset from /public/assets with a versioned filename to bust caches; update og:image/og:image:secure_url/twitter:image to the new URL; keep canonical/og:url/twitter:url consistent with trailing slash.
known_issues: OG/Twitter Card appears cached/incorrect on X (Twitter); requires cache-busting OG image + consistent meta tags/URLs.

existing_features.title: Add a new versioned Open Graph image file named `ogcard-v2.jpg` and ensure it is deployed as a direct static asset at `frontend/public/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` (served without routing or JS handling).

Update `frontend/index.html` to replace all Open Graph and Twitter image meta tags to use the exact absolute URL `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` for `og:image`, `og:image:secure_url`, and `twitter:image`.
Ensure URL consistency across metadata by using the exact trailing-slash URL `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/` for the canonical link, `og:url`, and `twitter:url` in `frontend/index.html`.

Update `frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5` so the new static OG image at `assets/ogcard-v2.jpg` is explicitly included (not ignored) and served with appropriate headers (at minimum correct `Content-Type: image/jpeg`).

Update `frontend/OG_PREVIEW_VERIFICATION.md` to reference the new OG image URL/path (`https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/assets/ogcard-v2.jpg`) instead of the old `ogcard.jpg`, including the verification steps and deployment checklist paths.
